Package Driver

Class Driver

java.lang.Object
Driver.Driver
public class Driver extends Object
This is Driver class implementing main method. There are some methods requested in assignment syllabus: 1)A method called getBiggestBook() to display the biggest book 2)A method called copyBooks() to make a deep copy of the array of books passed as parameter
